name: Splodge
description:
Splodge is about a little creature exploring a world and finding out what things once were. Recommended in 4:3 aspect ratio, Use WASD or arrow keys to move around and space/enter to interact then use a keyboard to type text. There are two levels in the game and everything is made from clay and physical materials :) Hope you enjoy!

Alt + F4 to exit the game, sorry!

Created for Global Game Jam 2020 at Grange-Over-Sands by:

Claire Morley (@shimmerwitch)- Programming, Clay

Douglas Flinders (@douglasflinders) - Clay, Photoshop

James Wood (@jctwood) - Programming, Clay
